import React from 'react'; import Avatar from '../helpers/Avatar'; import Like from '../helpers/Like'; import Delete from '../helpers/Delete'; import Edit from '../helpers/Edit'; function Message(props) { return (
{ props.data.userId === props.myId ?
{props.data.text}
{props.data.editedAt ? props.data.editedAt : props.data.createdAt }
:
{props.data.user}
{props.data.text}
{props.data.editedAt ? props.data.editedAt : props.data.createdAt }
}
) } export default Message
